website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular spoon rest offers a sleek design to match any kitchen decor.
pros: Stainless steel construction offers an unbreakable product
Fits both small and large spoons
Can be purchased in different sizes and styles
cons: Not as stain-resistant as other similar models
Heavier than a few buyers wanted

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and finish
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, literally the cheapest thing you can buy. They have nicks and scratches all over them, and the edges around where the metal was stamped shows obvious scuffs / machining marks. Do not buy if you want a quality piece!
customer_reviews.author: Verified Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy-duty as you would think
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to what other reviewers said, I didn't find this product to be too heavy. I did, however, expect it to be a tiny bit more stain-resistant, as it gets heavy traffic when I'm cooking and doesn't ever seem to be quite clean. My mother had something similar when I was growing up that rarely needed more than a rinse, while I have to scrub this with hot water and then dish-wash it after every use to prevent permanent stains. It's also a tiny bit awkward--I've had utensils just fall out, as the "handle" of the rest is oddly rounded. That said, it serves its purpose and isn't too ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Serena S.

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after 2 washings
customer_reviews.text: Rusted top and bottom after 2 washings. Cannot get the rust off and will not use any more. Purchased Oggi 7048 Stainless Steel Spoon Rest, 8.25 inch by 4.5 inch
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: Quality Metal
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a solid piece of metal. This is no cheap piece of bendable garbage. This is well built and does a good job of holding my utensils. Whether or not this will last is still many months away, but I will update later on that.
customer_reviews.author: Wathan48

customer_reviews.title: HEEL END OF THE SPOON REST IS SHARP
customer_reviews.text: The heel end of this spoon rest is sharp and will scratch your stove or counter. I had to return because of this flawed item.
customer_reviews.author: sjctenn

customer_reviews.title: Ok I suppose, but TINY
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I should have looked at the dimensions, but this is the smallest spoon rest I've ever encountered. I works well enough for my spoons and such, but when it comes to spatulas I still have to get out a plate. I didn't know they made spoon rests so small. Other than that, the quality is good so far. No scratches or dings.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I always hated when I would make food and I did not have anywhere to put the spoon. It was a battle between either getting my counter/stove dirty with whatever was on the spoon or getting the spoon dirty if something was on the counter. I saw a lot of spoons that were easily going for double this price and this one works just as well as the more expensive ones. It is dishwasher safe and big enough to rest my soup ladles on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel spoon rest is all I wanted--a good price, a functional item for my kitchen, sturdy (won't break like my ceramic one did), attractive, etc. I highly recommend it to those who are looking for these qualities in a spoon rest. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Replaced a ceramic spoon holder I’ve had for years which didn’t live up to 4 teenage boys. This one is great looking, sturdy, easy to clean and matches the rest of my kitchen...unlike the ceramic
customer_reviews.author: MegAnd

customer_reviews.title: OUT WITH CERAMICS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This spoon rest is AWESOME! I ordered it after my ceramic one broke in my sink when I was washing it...total disaster! I won't do that again! At least I don't have to worry about this one breaking, thank goodness!! It is so nice, has washed up well, and is the perfect size to put by my coffee pot! Price was great too! Bought as an add-on item.
customer_reviews.author: #1ReedusFan

customer_reviews.title: Size specifications incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I received this item today and quickly realized that the size specification on the Amazon website is incorrect. Specs say it's 4.5 in wide and it is not. It is not even 4 inches wide. Needless to say it will be returned immediately
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stainless
customer_reviews.text: Great little spoon rest. I'll update my review if I notice any problems in the future such as rust. However, I am not expecting any problems.
customer_reviews.author: roboticsguy1988

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pricing and durability. Looks good, too.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a holder in a ceramic and it cracked in a few weeks. I bought this as a gift with a knife set that matched. This is of a stainless steel material. He loves it. Dishwasher safe, no worry of dropping it on the floor and it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Had it for months now and it's exactly as advertised. This is sturdy - dropped it and no scratches, dents, and still intact. Our last spoom rest was ceramic and broke when we dropped it. Also, its incredibly easy to clean. It does fine in the dishwasher on the top rack and rinses easily too. Doesnt stain either.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn M

customer_reviews.title: Well made, and great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted at a size that was perfect for my stovetop. For the price, I don't think you'll find better for a stainless model.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Groux

customer_reviews.title: RUST
customer_reviews.text: It is a good thing I bought two. The first one started to rust on the inside curve of the spoon in the front. Everything about the spoon is fine with the exception of rust appearing on the inside edge.
customer_reviews.author: Ron The Artiste'

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, great price
customer_reviews.text: This product is heavy, well made, plain but pretty in its simplicity. I bought two -- one for the stove and one for the counter top. These should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, very light
customer_reviews.text: Not very heavy—easy to knock around and just feels cheap. Works (well balanced) and looks nice, but I want one that is heavier and not so easy to bump around the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Danny Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Pointed edge and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality stainless steel however then end of the spoon, where it would rest on my stove, has a pointed edge and is sharp. Not risking it will scratch my new stove. This is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Holly E

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a spoon test for my stove. I just hope it doesn’t scratch it but I haven’t had that issue so far. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Harletta Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Well sized sturdy well made
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the size i thought it would be smaller for the price. Clean finish also well made. I had a plastic one that kept melting on the hobo so this was the perfect solution fits most sized spoons a great addition to the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: sophie t

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted. Not very heavy but does the trick. Easy to clean. Good size. Good price. Matches my other stainless steel. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leb Woman

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Finish Stained within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: There are several stains on the handle of this item. Have tried polishing with Weimans Stainless Polish. It won't come off. Up until then I thought they were great. That wasn't very long. I actually have 3rd on I ordered I can't stop that I will send back.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Beck

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, it works perfectly and holds a good size cooking utensil.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: spotty quality control leads to questionable product
customer_reviews.text: Product was received with various stains on the spoon rest and the stainless coating chipping already; appears that either QC was sorely lacking or the product was shipped used. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Will last forever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for intended use. Precisely had a ceramic one that was dropped and broke. This is thick sturdy metal, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: A Regular Mom

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: No extra frills or pizzazz, just a nice, sensible spoon rest. Looks sleek. Doesn't take up more space than needed, which is always nice
customer_reviews.author: sa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and large.
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to handle a ladle. Well designed and sturdy. Bought 3 of them to keep on either side of my stove and Tony counter next to my instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Hemmerling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Better than l expected. Sturdy. Something that’s very functional in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I was remodeling my kitchen when I added these pieces. Looks great in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Shesalulu

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality . Rough sharp edges . Really junk . How can you mess up a stainless Steele spoon rest ?
customer_reviews.author: Grammashe

customer_reviews.title: Good For Soup
customer_reviews.text: I like to take big bites of soup, the normal sized spoons werent big enough. I bout this spoon and tried it out........ now i get the perfect amount of soup in each bite
customer_reviews.author: David Zak

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Use this daily. Works great to hold my stirring spoons and spatulas while cooking
customer_reviews.author: Runnindherd

customer_reviews.title: Little small
customer_reviews.text: Kinda small if you want to use for cooking utensils, good for teaspoon though
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: I like this spoon rest. As far as spoon rests go, it is a winner. Lightweight, stainless steel, machine washable, useful for spoons. Yes.
customer_reviews.author: beanpod

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a good spoon rest. Matches well with my oven. Only thing is it is smaller than I expected. I could put only one spatula on it, at one time. They shud may be have a picture with a spoon/ spatula/penny next to it to know better what size to buy.
customer_reviews.author: WheresMyCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My last one melted. This one wont. We love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Considering this is just to keep cooking utensils off the counter, very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Eichhorn

customer_reviews.title: Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: These came two in a pack and are perfect. They are unbreakable, unlike ceramic spoon rests, and I always have a clean one.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great spoon rest. Stainless steel and heavy duty. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kewanee Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price. Simple
customer_reviews.text: Its as simple as it gets. Its stainless steel and itls shaped like a spoon. It works exactly as it should for $6. My only complaint is that it isnt as heavy as expected. It doesnt slide around per se, I just wish it was a little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Austin C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spoon rest! I had a ceramic one and it broke. No worries with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Karol Gianni

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This item is fine. It’s just smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.author: N. Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Still stuck
customer_reviews.text: The stickers adhered to spoon rest are stupid stuck!!! Been soaking for 3 days. —- still stuck to holder
customer_reviews.author: Ant Cweed

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and useful
customer_reviews.text: Solid, very nice looking on stove. It has a nice finish to the metal. Perfect size for assorted utensils
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its good but a little thin i thought it was gonna be a little bit more heavy
customer_reviews.author: yamilet gomez

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Spoon was a little smaller than I would of liked.
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, cleans easily
customer_reviews.text: no real complains. wishing i got something with a little more personality, but this is sleek and looks nice enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s sturdy and super easy to clean. I have a glass top stove so it helps contain cooked on splatter from my cooking utensils
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The steel spoon is the perfect size to store cooking utensils on while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Very solid metal, you could probably hammer a nail with this thing. Perfect shape. Large enough, I was afraid it’d be too small. Outstanding for $5. Whoever put up the pics that look bad might be a higher-priced competitor, who knows. There’s a tiny blue discoloration on one edge but that's it on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Fincher

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought, doesn't catch all the drip from standard sized spatulas or stirring spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hearted

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This isn't fancy but looks decent and serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So glad we finally bought this. Such a good price for stainless steel. It’s held up to the beating it takes in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as one would expect
customer_reviews.text: It’s a big metal spoon that does it job. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: yang408

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after one wash
customer_reviews.text: This thing was rusty as soon as I took it out of the dishwasher (top rack) for the first time. Not truly stainless steel I guess
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Newman

customer_reviews.title: Good election
customer_reviews.text: I really like it... It's beautiful and has a good finishes
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Amado

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Simple
customer_reviews.text: It is a spoon rest. It's metallic so it is sturdy and won't break easily. And it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: nothing super fancy or decorative
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, holds my spoons so I'm not getting the kitchen messy while cooking. It's very simple, nothing super fancy or decorative, but matches stainless steel appliances nicely. Just wish it were a little larger, as I worry that some of the larger utensils (like a soup ladle, for instance) are going to leak mess off the sides or tip off the end. Holds up just fine in the dishwasher and is really easy to wash off for next use.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money, great for gifting
customer_reviews.text: Got a few for gifting and highly impressed with the quality and sturdiness. Did not use this myself but gifted to a few folks and everyone seemed to like it. Good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Anush R

customer_reviews.title: Much less clean up now!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted! It is something to use while cooking every meal, and not spending a lot to get it. I'm cleaning my counter tops much less now. It's great. I'm going to get another one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Nice but rusts easily
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and is easy to clean, good size for all types of spoons and spatulas. Only complaint is that it started rusting after only a couple uses, even with only hand washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Boydston

customer_reviews.title: Oversize spoon rest
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, I love the large oversize-ness of it. Perfect for spoons and spatulas!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Goes good in the kitchen, hasn’t rusted or anything yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: THis thing was is tight af. It hold my spoon when i be making spagety sause and my stove dont be gitteng dirrty. they say it made of steele but i think it platnum.
customer_reviews.author: steven mathews

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a shallow ceramic spoon rest with this. It has a fairly deep cup area to retain drips from utensils- keeping counter and stove top clean as you cook. The stainless steel looks updated and clean. Good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TrykaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as Advertised, easy to clean. Looks good on counter. We have two - one on each side of stovetop.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiInMinnesota

customer_reviews.title: spoon holder
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok. Don't remember the price but it is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality finish
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality finish, would not purchase again. Did not meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: David Rossiter

customer_reviews.title: sharp edges on handle
customer_reviews.text: does what it's supposed to (how could it not?), but the end of the handle has sharp edges that should have been filed down by the manufacturer. could scratch up your stove or countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I love how this stainless steel looks
customer_reviews.text: I love how this stainless steel looks, but it's already rusting after three months. I guess I'll have to repurchase and just make sure to keep it dry and wash by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight, good size without being huge and looks nice. One problem, I ordered two and one came with scratches on the handle. I will be keeping it anyway. I am otherwise satisfied with the product. Although they say dishwasher safe I don't think that I will put them in the dishwasher. They are quick and easy enough to hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this spoon rest! Washes well in the dishwasher, looks nice next to my stainless stove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need. Sturdy and holds what I need it to while I'm cooking. Replaced my porcelain one so I don't have to worry about dropping it on the ground or in the sink
customer_reviews.author: ronin915

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: It would be hard not to give this 5 stars... it's a spoon rest, and my spoons rest comfortably on it. It looks exactly as pictured, so... yeah, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KarateGirl258

customer_reviews.title: ... then I decided something in stainless steel would be good ( I hate plastic and melamine stuff) This is ...
customer_reviews.text: My old ceramic one broke and then I decided something in stainless steel would be good ( I hate plastic and melamine stuff) This is non breakable (unlike ceramic) and looks beautiful in my kitchen matching my stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come in Brand New
customer_reviews.text: The sticker came in like it was removed and placed again. The spoon came in scratched all over and bend. If it would of came Brand new It would of been perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Easy to clean. I need to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: It had a couple of stains on it upon arrival that cannot be removed. From across the kitchen, it looks fine. When you get close the stains are evident.
customer_reviews.author: Very Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Contains the Mess
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. With a black stove, even water drops and stains look yucky so this is a good thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: LeaveThisSpaceBlank

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the spoon rest is large enough that I can use it with any of my kitchen cooking utensils!
customer_reviews.author: BlessedCaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get these sooner!?!
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job holding my cooking spoons while I'm cooking and is so easy to clean up, even if I forget to do it right away and do it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Louise

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose. Looks nice on my stove & matches decor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap and super useful
customer_reviews.text: It’s not lightweight enough that won’t hold big utensils. Super cheap and super useful.
customer_reviews.author: Mical GT

customer_reviews.title: Spiffy!
customer_reviews.text: Matches the sink and other kitchen things. It's a good size (not too big) and does the job. I've sent it through the dishwasher several times and it comes out looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: TucsonTNR

customer_reviews.title: Rusts Easy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shape and width. Only down side was that it already started rusting in the middle after 2 months
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching.
customer_reviews.text: The OGGI spoon rest(on the right) from years ago still looks great, like brand new. The one I just bought a couple weeks ago and never used...looks horrible. One wash cycle in the dishwasher and it’s discolored. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Larger spoons don't seem to rest well in this; poorly designed. Also, it is already rusting.
customer_reviews.author: John Connolly

customer_reviews.title: I bought it to use with my grill but Wifey stole it
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made spoon boat. I bought it to use with my grill but Wifey stole it. Guess I need to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not too heavy, not too light
customer_reviews.text: It's great for a countertop or stove top. It's not light and flimsy at all, but not super heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer 999

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Strong, easy to clean and could make a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Falu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally got smart and purchase a stainless steel one when I broke my last two ceramic ones
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable to great price. Good to great quality and it also looks nice...
customer_reviews.author: Bluew

customer_reviews.title: Close enough.
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 and wanted to get a couple for our daughter and our garage kitchen. They work but are thinner and more dull than the tee we had, but it’ll work.
customer_reviews.author: AMBER TAUNTON

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, perfect size for resting cooking utensils on while using the stove top. We use this by our coffeepot for stir spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Moore

customer_reviews.title: It's a great size for any spoon and cleans up super easy
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size for any spoon and cleans up super easy. It goes perfect with any stainless steel kitchen appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Cariscmt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and does its thing why spend 30 on a stove spoon holder
customer_reviews.author: Abrielle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These spoon rests are terrible. The finish is pitted along the edges. The quality is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: KatChris

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gest rusty when I wash it,but nothing than rcb couldn't get off,It works fine
customer_reviews.author: Asinvera

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steele spoon rest arrived bent on one side, was rough and unfinished around the entire spoon. Really light weight and will be sliding around my quartz kitchen countertop when used.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Dallevamazon Customer

product_meta.title: Oggi Stainless Steel Spoon Rest, 8.25 inch by 4.5 inch
product_meta.description: The Oggi Stainless Steel spoon rest fits just about any size spoon while taking up little room on your counter. Spoon rest sits on or next to the stove (not on a burner) to hold messy spoons after stirring a pot. Measures 8. 25" X 4. 5". Safe for use in the dishwasher.
feature_bullets: Hold messy spoons after stirring a pot
Safe for use in the dishwasher
Fits just about any size spoon

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,798 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
